meanings.definition: Emitting light when exposed to electromagnetic radiation
meanings.sent1: The florescent stars in the night sky shone brightly.
meanings.sent2: The florescent glow of the fireflies lit up the garden.
meanings.sent3: The alien spaceship had a florescent aura around it, making it look otherworldly.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was so florescent, it seemed to light up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The florescent paint on the walls made the room feel magical.

meanings.definition: A type of light bulb that produces light by causing a phosphor coating on the inside of the bulb to glow
meanings.sent1: The florescent in the office flickered annoyingly.
meanings.sent2: She replaced the old incandescent bulb with a new florescent one.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat batted at the florescent, trying to catch the moving light.
meanings.sent4: The florescent hum of the bulbs filled the room with a soft buzz.
meanings.sent5: The florescent above the mirror made the bathroom bright and clear.
